metadata.name: "A Helping Hand"
metadata.description:
"A Helping Hand" is a thought-provoking, beautifully rendered oil on canvas painting that captures the essence of community and support in the NFT space. 

The image of two hands, one holding onto a bloody hand, is a powerful symbol of the struggles and challenges faced by those starting out in this exciting and rapidly growing field. But with the help and guidance of others, they are able to rise above their difficulties and reach new heights. This modern artwork, inspired by the aspirational writing of Oscar Wilde, is a tribute to the underappreciated but essential aspect of web3: community. 

This artwork is for anyone who appreciates the power of support and the transformative impact it can have on our lives.
